workplaces.description: Provided help for designing automated Reporting Systems for clients using Microsoft Dynamics 365.

Created multiple types of projects ranging multiple technology areas. Developed web and mobile apps for internal management, for competition and for external entities such as World Vision Guatemala. I also developed AI projects to improve the quality of existent projects and also introducing new innovating ideas such as image modification and also body movement detection; being the last one a project presented in the event MakerFaire CDMX 2023. Additionally, I designed friendly and automatized logistics of some internal processes.

Teach engineering students about Artificial Intelligence, specifically Deep Learning Area. Additionally, I have redesigned the class twice to always keep up with the current trends in the AI Industry.
